member.name: EMRANGLEARC
member.summary: The EMRANGLEARC structure contains members for the enhanced metafile record.

member.name: EMRANGLEARC.emr
member.summary: The base structure for all record types.

member.name: EMRANGLEARC.ptlCenter
member.summary: Logical coordinates of a circle's center.

member.name: EMRANGLEARC.nRadius
member.summary: A circle's radius, in logical units.

member.name: EMRANGLEARC.eStartAngle
member.summary: An arc's start angle, in degrees.

member.name: EMRANGLEARC.eSweepAngle
member.summary: An arc's sweep angle, in degrees.
